recipe.title: Brownies with Chipotle-Cherry Whipped Cream
instructions: In a large bowl, whisk heavy whipping cream with chopped cherry preserves, chipotle adobo sauce, vanilla extract, and almond extract until peaks form. Serve with brownies.
